summary: Very simple mod that removes the glow from daedric armour. Fully compatible with most daedric retexture mods too.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very quick and simple mod that removes the glow from daedric armour which I\'ve overheard various people suggest before. Since it only affects the mesh and not the textures it should be compatible with the majority of daedric recolour mods if you want to combine them.



Simply extract the contents of the zip into your skyrim data folder, usually found under:
/program files/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/



To uninstall, delete the contents of data/armour/daedric/ and data/weapons/daedric/
author: Ryuujin
